sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components";
import { Container } from "../styles/general/General.styled";
import {
  LandingImage,
  LandingInner,
  Title,
  Subtitle,
  Section,
  FeatureList,
  Feature,
  Icon,
  ReviewSection,
  Review,
  Stars
} from "../styles/Landing.styled";
import Footer from "./general/Footer";
import theme from "./general/theme";
import Navbar from "./general/Navbar";
import { Btn, Divider, FlexCentered } from "../styles/general/General.styled";

const Landing = () => {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
      <Container mh="100vh">
        <Navbar />
        <LandingImage>
          <LandingInner>
            <FlexCentered>
              <Title>One Call Away</Title>
              <Subtitle>
                Connect with friends and families anytime, anywhere
              </Subtitle>
              <Btn
                hoverColor="rgba(237, 66, 100, 1)"
                br="1.8rem"
                size="1.5rem"
                margin="6rem 0 0 0"
                bgColor="rgba(237, 66, 100, 0.9)"
                padding="0.8rem 1.5rem"
                boxShadowColor="#fff">
                Sign Up
              </Btn>
            </FlexCentered>
          </LandingInner>
        </LandingImage>
        <Divider />
        <Section bgColor="#fffde7">
          <FlexCentered>
            <Title
              fontSize="2.5rem"
              margin="0 0 1rem 0"
              textDecoration="underline">
              Features
            </Title>
            <FeatureList>
              <Feature>
                <Icon />
                Invite friends with a simple link
              </Feature>
              <Feature>
                <Icon />
                Chat with anyone - anywhere
              </Feature>
              <Feature>
                <Icon />
                All for FREE!
              </Feature>
            </FeatureList>
          </FlexCentered>
        </Section>
        <Divider />
        <Section bgColor="#dcedc8" mb="1rem">
          <Title fontSize="2.5rem" margin="1rem 0" textDecoration="underline">
            What our users are saying...
          </Title>
          <FlexCentered>
            <ReviewSection>
              <FlexCentered>
                <Stars>⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐</Stars>
                <Review>
                  This site makes it crazy easy for me to hop in a call with my
                  bros during a game. What a revolutionary product!
                </Review>
              </FlexCentered>
            </ReviewSection>
          </FlexCentered>
        </Section>
        <Footer />
      </Container>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
};

export default Landing;
